industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 其他] Competition watchdog not yet notified of Clementi Mall sale, potential CapitaLand-Mapletree merger
industry_observations.text_zh: [13-01-26 · 其他] 竞争监管机构尚未收到关于克莱门蒂购物中心出售和潜在的凯德-美利坚合并的通知
industry_observations.summary: Informing CCS in such cases is voluntary, but the watchdog will monitor both developments, says Gan Kim Yong.

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 科技] GLS sales, commercial deals lift Singapore 2025 property investment to $40 billion
industry_observations.text_zh: [13-01-26 · 科技] GLS销售和商业交易推动新加坡2025年房地产投资达到400亿美元
industry_observations.summary: Total investment sales in 2026 are expected to remain robust at around $30 billion.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 预计2026年的总投资销售将保持强劲，约为300亿美元。

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 科技] SGX proposes bond futures for India, South-east Asia, sources say
industry_observations.text_zh: [13-01-26 · 科技] 新加坡交易所提议为印度和东南亚推出债券期货，消息人士称
industry_observations.summary: It held multiple calls with treasury officials from global banks about introducing the futures, sources said.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 消息人士称，它与全球银行的财政官员进行了多次电话会议，讨论引入期货。

industry_observations.summary_zh: 此次合并预计将创造一个市值近158亿新元的基础设施巨头。

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 科技] Budget 2026: SBF, PwC list out 18 recommendations to strengthen Singapore economy

industry_observations.summary: Business group calls for AI boost, carbon cost relief and hub safeguards as global uncertainties mount ahead of Budget 2026.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 商业团体呼吁在2026年预算前，推动人工智能、减轻碳成本和加强中心保障，以应对日益加剧的全球不确定性。

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 其他] E-commerce platforms such as Shopee expand into insurance, drawing closer regulatory scrutiny
industry_observations.text_zh: [13-01-26 · 其他] 电子商务平台如Shopee扩展至保险领域，面临更严格的监管审查
industry_observations.summary: Questions around governance and oversight of these digital sales channels are coming into sharper focus.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 关于这些数字销售渠道的治理和监督问题正变得愈加突出。

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 科技] DBS and OCBC break new records, SGX rises amid volatility in Venezuela

industry_observations.summary: The SGX saw its first listing of the year with Concord New Energy debuting on the mainboard.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 新加坡交易所今年首次上市，康科德新能源在主板上市。

industry_observations.text: [13-01-26 · 科技] Growing buzz around EVs draws 25% more visitors to Singapore Motorshow
industry_observations.text_zh: [13-01-26 · 科技] 电动车的热潮吸引了25%的更多访客参加新加坡汽车展
industry_observations.summary: More players are expected to enter the luxury EV market to meet growing demand in Singapore, said carmakers.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 汽车制造商表示，预计将有更多参与者进入奢侈电动车市场，以满足新加坡日益增长的需求。
